overview: Includes the following episodes:  SpongeBob SquarePants "Scaredy Pants"  Rugrats "Curse of the Werewuff"  Nickelodeon Rocket Power "It Came From Planet Merv" and "Netherworld Night"  Hey Arnold! "Arnold's Halloween"  The Fairly OddParents "Scary Godparents"
title: Nicktoons - Halloween - Tales of Fright
